attributes.action: All Nigerian Government assets in UK should be Seized.
attributes.additional_details: Release it to the poor masses.
attributes.background:
Seize all Government assets in UK. 
It belongs to the poor masses Of Nigeria.

rejection.details:
We understand you want the UK Government to seize assets, but it isn't clear what assets you mean, who they belong to, or why you want this to happen.

You may wish to sign these petitions on a related issue:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555332
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555305
